name: Unbound: Worlds Apart
detailed_description:
Unbound is an atmospheric 2D Puzzle-Platformer where the main character, Soli, can conjure magic portals to travel between different realities in order to learn more about the catastrophe that ravaged his world. Inside certain portals, the physical properties of the character or world elements can change, offering new gameplay possibilities.

Unbound’s artistic approach can be summarized as a dark fairy tale presented in a cartoonish style, with the purpose to give the game experience a fresh look and feel. Curiosity and exploration will have an impact on the overall atmosphere .
about_the_game:

Inside certain portals, the physical properties of the character or world elements can change, offering new gameplay possibilities.

Unbound’s artistic approach can be summarized as a dark fairy tale presented in a cartoonish style, with the purpose to give the game experience a fresh look and feel. Curiosity and exploration will have an impact on the overall atmosphere .
short_description: Explore beautiful crafted worlds  using portals and solve puzzles by thinking how to use the enemies in order to progress through your adventure.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 and above
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 @ 2.00 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU recommended
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 @ 3.00 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU recommended
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
